review_text: This is a movie that may have been better told as a mini-series.  There is a lot of story available to mine for the entire cast of characters.  The movie does a good job of bringing those characters to life, but it still feels like it's only scratching the surface; only giving you a glimpse of what it's like for those characters.  The movie is based on a novel, and I'm now more likely to go read the novel to see if more is revealed.
